code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Box,Container}from'@mui/material';import Navbar from'./Navbar';import Sidebar from'./Sidebar';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PrivateRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{user,loading}=useAuth();const[sidebarOpen,setSidebarOpen]=useState(false);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true});}const handleDrawerToggle=()=>setSidebarOpen(open=>!open);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{onDrawerToggle:handleDrawerToggle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{open:sidebarOpen,onDrawerToggle:handleDrawerToggle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{component:"main",sx:{flexGrow:1,p:{xs:1,sm:3},width:{xs:'100%',sm:"calc(100% - ".concat(240,"px)")},mt:{xs:'56px',sm:'64px'}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"lg",children:children})})]});};export default PrivateRoute;
